member.name: IMFPresentationTimeSource.GetUnderlyingClock
member.summary: Retrieves the underlying clock that the presentation time source uses to generate its clock times.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the clock's interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: This time source does not expose an underlying clock.

member.name: IMFPresentationTimeSource
member.summary: Provides the clock times for the presentation clock.
